author: MedoX71T
message:
CVE-2023-37920 @ requirements_mac.txt

Update certifi dependency to version 2023.7.22 or newer to resolve CVE-2023-37920.
â€‹This patch removes the untrusted e-Tugra root certificate from the root store, mitigating the risk of Man-in-the-Middle (MITM) attacks through certificate spoofing in the Mac build environment.

files.patch:
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 -r requirements_common.txt
 
 # Dependencies only required for Mac
-certifi ~= 2022.12.07
+certifi ~= 2023.7.22
 
 # Install build related dependencies
 twine ~= 3.6.0
